headline: Review & Preview: Time to Carve
summary: The Nasdaq Composite was up 0.8%.  Wall Street got updates on durable goods and weekly jobless claims, neither of which significantly shifted a resurgence in optimism surrounding a December interest-rate cut.  Unlike most of the shutdown-delayed government data of late, jobless claims actually came out a day early, thanks to tomorrow’s holiday.
